content.text: Match ends, LA Galaxy 0, Milan 2.
Second Half ends, LA Galaxy 0, Milan 2.
Attempt missed. Bakaye Traoré (Milan) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Kevin Constant with a cross.
Attempt saved. Bakaye Traoré (Milan) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sulley Muntari.
Offside, Milan. Nigel de Jong tries a through ball, but Bakaye Traoré is caught offside.
Foul by Oscar Sorto (LA Galaxy).
Kevin Constant (Milan) wins a free kick on the left wing.
